price: 108. Esos son aquellos cuyos corazones, oídos y vista Al-lah ha sellado (por negar la verdad), y esos desconocen (el castigo que Al-lah les tiene preparado).
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim wasamʿihim wa-abṣārihim wa-ulāika humu al-ghāfilūna
